title: Gladitorcomeback
author: Gladitorcomeback
content: Ethereum was dumped down to 950$ in latest Bear market and now it's trading 2x from that price. My question is , what is best price to buy ? Buy now or wait to down 600$?

comments.author: cryptoperkele
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on August 16, 2022, 11:22:28 AMEthereum was dumped down to 950$ in latest Bear market and now it's trading 2x from that price. My question is , what is best price to buy ? Buy now or wait to down 600$?What? Imho, best time was ages ago and 600 is highly unlikely. But anything you can get under 2000 is good. Also you can't time the bottom so you might be better of buying slowly during next year and dollar cost averge your price.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Don't go for the bottom or best time but instead focus on buying as much as possible while the price isn't in the ATH yet because once you missed buying those prices, you will regret why you didn't buy them when you have the money or time. I'm just saying this because nobody knows what will be the future of the coin we want to invest.What I'm trying to say is to focus on less risky than risk it all just to wait for the right price because there's no such thing as right price, you just have to earn the profit that you want.

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on August 16, 2022, 11:22:28 AMEthereum was dumped down to 950$ in latest Bear market and now it's trading 2x from that price. My question is , what is best price to buy ? Buy now or wait to down 600$?Maybe you are the one who passed up the opportunity to buy ethereum for $900 because then you were waiting for the price to go lower and now you regret that eth did not decrease but increased and now eth price is x2. If you don't dare to buy for $900 why would you want to buy for $1900. I don't know if you are newbie to the market or new to this forum, but you should take the time to learn more before you want to invest in crypto.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: The ship has sailed. Price had even hit the $2000 mark a few days ago and seems sure the price will be back up again soon. The best price is when it's dipping. I would wait for the price to probably drop to $1770. Although I'm not sure if it will really dip in this price, so buy now or I would suggest waiting or investing in something else if it doesn't drop, there are more opportunities besides ETH.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on August 16, 2022, 11:22:28 AMEthereum was dumped down to 950$ in latest Bear market and now it's trading 2x from that price. My question is , what is best price to buy ? Buy now or wait to down 600$?The best price to buy is the price you can accept because even if it drops to $950 but you can't accept that price and wait until the price drops to $600, it's not the best price for you.You have to rethink if you want to wait for the price to return to $950 because it may not come back again. After all, now the price of ethereum is $1800. But really, no one knows whether the price will stay at the current level or go back down sharply and we can only wait. So to find the best price to buy, you have to do your own analysis and not follow other people's advice.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on August 16, 2022, 11:22:28 AMEthereum was dumped down to 950$ in latest Bear market and now it's trading 2x from that price. My question is , what is best price to buy ? Buy now or wait to down 600$?Unfortunately, no one has the crystal ball to see if Ethereum will still go down to $600 or not. So maybe the best approach is do to DCA. I know your frustrations, we always wanted to buy at the lows, but it's hard to time the market as it is.And I would say that there are traders that got lucky to be able to buy < $1000 because they have profited already. Or maybe you are not that late because next month we will have the merger in the mainnet and it is schedule - Sept 15/16 as this news could trigger another Ethereum run.

Buy now or wait to down 600$?Just wait as you please if you want to buy ethereum for $600 which I don't think is possible, and if you look and compare with current prices. And the difference is huge and it takes quite a while for the price of ethereum to drop to the price you want.it's good to buy anytime as long as the price is still below the previous high of ATH, and hold it for the long term, and buy with money you can afford to lose before the price of ethereum continues to rise.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: The price has gone back up are you sure you are waiting for $600 while you are waiting for a more severe bear market, did you pass $900 and then now $1800 of course it's double if you bought before, but regrets sometimes make us think whether to buy now or not.I myself Ethereum is one of the best coins from the current price there is a possibility to go up again so if you believe make a purchase now there will be big news in September but there is a possibility to increase, but if you think this is too heavy then do a DCA to accumulate the purchase value.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: you can buy it for $600 but only in a dream, it seems difficult to see the price of ETH go below $1000 again, considering that ETH 2.0 will also be released of course many people will be interested in this project again and push the price up again to reach the next ATH, don't wait for the price to go lower If you have the chance to take that moment, take it and save it for years to come

comments.author: mzuhry19
comments.body: the best price is the price according to our analysis the lowest price, but when you miss it's better to use the DCA system

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: For me, I have a buying zone. It is around $1600 or below of that price.When Ethereum touched the $2,000 level earlier and it seems rejected, if you take a look on EMA 180 on daily timeframe, it is showing that is the resistance right now and it was tested earlier but rejected. For me, we will test again the $2,000 before visiting the $1,600 level.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Waiting may backfire and the opportunity slips away, I mean Ethereum may continue to rise and not fall for this price and then you will have missed a good chance to get Ethereum at a good price, the best thing in such cases is DCA buy at that price and then if it goes down more you buy another amount and so on until you get A good average price in the long run, this is better than waiting for unknown results.
